title: The Romance of the Unicorn
description: Something in Elayne's refrigerator turned her pedigree Siamese cat into a troll. Find ing entry to a magical world, Elayne found its king mad, its queen imprisoned, and its city suffering from the Plague.To set things right, Elayne must find the talisman of the Royal House of Faye.
author: Cynthia Joyce Clay
